description: Try our easy to follow Hot Cross Bun Fried Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hot Cross Bun Fried Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs icing sugar, to serve (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with plastic wrap. Place ice-cream scoops on prepared tray, cover with plastic wrap and freeze for 1 hour or until firm.

Place 1 open hot cross bun on a piece of plastic wrap and flatten with a rolling pin. Top with a scoop of ice-cream, fold to close, wrap tightly in plastic wrap and return to freezer. Repeat procedure with remaining buns and ice-cream scoops. Freeze for 4 hours or overnight.

Whisk together egg, flour and 1 cup cold water. Heat oil in a large saucepan to 200Â°C. Remove 1 hot cross bun from the freezer, unwrap, dip in batter and carefully fry for 1 minute. Drain on paper towel and return to freezer. Repeat procedure with remaining hot cross buns and freeze for at least 30 minutes. Remove fried buns from freezer and dust with icing sugar. Serve immediately.
